nodes.text: The Judicial Plaza was a plaza on the planet Coruscant. The Judicial Arcology, headquarters of the Galactic Republic's Judicial Department, was located on the plaza during the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

The Judicial Plaza was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. It was original created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the plaza was first mentioned in Coruscant and the Core Worlds, a 2003 supplement to Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
